column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was planning a relaxing vacation at the beach .
#id=2
#text=There was only one problem : I did n't live anywhere near a beach !
#id=3
#text=Driving to one in a car would take up too much of my fun vacation time .
#id=4
#text=I had to buy tickets for an airplane ride , which would take much less time because airplanes go very fast .
#id=5
#text=I went to the website of my local airport and found the available planes traveling to the city where I wanted to go at the time I was going on vacation and bought a ticket .
#id=6
#text=The planes were ready to fly only at certain times .
#id=7
#text=When it came time to go on my trip , I packed up my suitcases , drove to the airport before my plane was ready to fly , and parked my car .
#id=8
#text=Inside the airport , I had to go through a long line for security , so that they can make sure there are no dangerous items being taken on the plane .
#id=9
#text=The workers looked inside my suitcases with an X-Ray machine and checked the clothing I was wearing to make sure I was safe , too .
#text=When I was all done in security , I had to find the gate for my plane , where it would be ready to pick me and other passengers up .
#text=When it was time to board the plane , the stewardess helped me find my assigned seat and put my suitcase in the compartment above me .
#text=I buckled my seat belt and waited for the plane to take off .
#text=When all the passengers were on board , the stewardess explained what to do in an emergency , and the plane began to move .
#text=It became very noisy and all of a sudden , outside the window , I could see the ground get farther away .
#text=I felt like my body was being pushed against my seat a little bit .
#text=After a few minutes , the plane stopped going up and the stewardess told us we could take our seat belts off .
#text=She offered us drinks from a cart , and I was able to read a book I brought on the plane .
#text=I knew the ride would last a fair amount of time , so I made sure I had something to do .
#text=After a few hours , the captain explained on the intercom that we were arriving in the city .
#text=He told us to buckle our seat belts again , and the plane gently came closer to the ground .
#text=Finally , I felt a bump as the plane arrived at the airport in the new city .
#text=My plane ride was over , and my beach vacation was beginning .
